product_name: Osprey Digi Stow Accessory Pocket - Medium
long_description: Perfect for GPS units and digital point-and-shoot cameras, the Osprey Digi Stow accessory pocket can be attached almost anywhere on your pack with its versatile rip-and-stick strap.
